Best answer given my Indian Miss World
Death came to a guy and said,  “My frnd today is ur day”
Then death said, “Well ur name is the next on my list”.
Guy: “Okay why don’t u take a seat and I will
get u something to eat before we go?”.
The guy gave death some food with sleeping pills in it,
death finished eating and fell into a deep sleep.
The guy took the list & removed his name from top
of the list and put into the bottom of the list…
When death woke up he said to the guy,
“Because u have been so very nice to me,
I will start from the BOTTOM of the list”

Want to earn UNBEATABLE Incentives along with an attractive package?
Apetan Consulting LLC is hiring for the below mentioned profiles on an urgent basis.
- Minimum 6 month exp into US Staffing
- Minimum 4 years experience into US Staffing (Sales)
- Must be aware of all the aspects of US Staffing
# Salary:   Not a constraint for deserving candidates
# Incentives:   Recurring (Monthly, Quarterly, Consistency and many more)
# Other privileges:   UNBEATABLE Incentives+Employee friendly environment+ Meal+pick & drop facility for females
Interested candidates can share their CV at kritika@apetan.com or feel free to call @0120-6500721

Palnar Inc Is a leading global consulting but has extended its hands to Europe, the Middle East and India. Our services include: Software Consulting, Development, Sales, Service and Support. Palnar has a team of qualified software experts dedicated to the demands of its clients, reducing the design costs and time to market. Our knowledge engineers apply their experience and our advanced technology infrastructure to develop any new software or customize any existing ones to meet any requirements. We provide exceptional service and support, and are focused solely on delivering the best and most productive solutions for our customers. • Interview and hire IT Consultants on W2 or Corp-to-Corp hourly contracts as well as Full Time (FTE) to work at various client sites throughout the United States.

Responsible for handling the entire recruiting cycle such as sourcing, screening, contacting, confirming, interviewing, and placing the qualified consultant. •	Responsible for recruiting on contract, contract to hire, and permanent positions. •	Worked with H1Bs, Green card Holders and Citizens with constraints and complicated requirements. •	Worked exclusively with Implementation partners and preferred vendors.•	Understand the requirement and client specific needs•	Sourcing, Searching, identifying consultants using job boards like Dice & Monster and Internal Database.•	Telephonic Screening and discussion with the Consultant/Vendor regarding the skill set and rate negotiation (Corp 2 Corp as well as W2) •	Conducted phone screens, interviews, and reference check for prospective candidates. • Interaction with the consultants briefing them about requirement and to know their willingness.• Speak with candidates to know their priorities if they have any constraints like location, clients etc.,•	Submitting the profile to the concern Account Manager with perfect match as per the job requirement. .•	Scheduling interview with the client, following up with the candidates•	Follow up with the consultant and the client to check the post-submission status. •	Working closely with Account manager and Onsite manager•	Proficient in recruiting candidates from all levels Junior Level to Senior Level.•	Maintaining internal data base of consultants as per their Skill Sets.•	Arranging interviews on Video Conference for Virtual Presence of Candidates.•	Keeping track of consultants for future references.•	Handled all the IT Technologies involving combination of complex skill sets and rare technologies. CLIENTS ::  Walt Disney,  ESPN,  UPMC, US Steel,  PNC Bank  etc...
